work.name: minohealth AI Lab
highlights: Collaborated with a team to develop a comprehensive pipeline for curating and annotating medical data records.
Collaborated with colleagues to design and implement a multimodal AI system to assist healthcare workers.

education.institution: Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology

awards.title: Provosts Award for Excellent Students
awards.summary: This award is given to students who have demonstrated outstanding academic excellence in their studies.

publications.name: Brilla AI: AI Contestant for the National Science and Maths Quiz
publications.publisher: The 25th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence in Education (AIED 24)
publications.summary: Developed an AI contestant, Brilla AI, for the National Science and Maths Quiz (NSMQ) in Ghana, demonstrating real-time problem-solving in biology, chemistry, physics, and math.

publications.name: Towards an AI to Win Ghana's National Science and Maths Quiz
